info.description: REST API generated from CUE ontology. All endpoints accept/return JSON.
info.title: Propeller Property Management API

post.summary: Assign a role to a person
Activate a pending person role (transitions to "active")
Deactivate an active person role (transitions to "inactive")
Activate a portfolio after onboarding (transitions to "active")
Activate a property after onboarding (transitions to "active")
Create a new space within a property
Mark a space as occupied (transitions to "occupied")
Rescind a notice to vacate (transitions to "occupied")
Mark a space as vacant (transitions to "vacant")
Mark a space as down (out of service) (transitions to "down")
Mark a space as a model unit (transitions to "model")
Apply a credit to a lease

get.summary: Get ledger entries for a lease

post.summary: Submit lease draft for approval (transitions to "pending_approval")
Send lease for electronic signature (transitions to "pending_signature")
Terminate a lease early. Requires reason for audit trail (transitions to "terminated")
Post a journal entry. Lines must balance (debits = credits) (transitions to "posted")
Void a posted journal entry. Creates reversal entry (transitions to "voided")

get.summary: Get chronological activity feed for any entity. Use as FIRST call when assessing an entity.
Get pre-aggregated signal summary for an entity with category breakdowns, sentiment, and escalations.

post.summary: Batch screen multiple entities ranked by concern level. Use for portfolio-wide risk assessment.
Full-text search across all activity streams by keyword.
